                        function subst() {
                            var vars = {};
                            var x = document.location.search.substring(1).split('&');
                            for (var i in x) {
                                var z = x[i].split('=', 2);
                                vars[z[0]] = unescape(z[1]);
                            }
                            var fromPage = document.getElementsByClassName('page');
                            for(var j = 0; j<fromPage.length; j++)
                                fromPage[j].textContent = vars['sitepage'];
                            var toPage = document.getElementsByClassName('topage');
                            for(var j = 0; j<toPage.length; j++)
                                toPage[j].textContent = vars['sitepages'];

                            var index = vars['webpage'].split('.', 4)[3]
                            var header = document.getElementById('minimal_layout_report_headers');
                            if(header !== null){
                                var companyHeader = header.children[index];
                                header.textContent = '';
                                header.appendChild(companyHeader);
                            }
                            var footer = document.getElementById('minimal_layout_report_footers');
                            if(footer !== null){
                                var companyFooter = footer.children[index];
                                footer.textContent = '';
                                footer.appendChild(companyFooter);
                            }
                        }
                        function pagination_hide() {
                            var vars = {};
                            var x = document.location.search.substring(1).split('&');
                            for (var i in x) {
                                var z = x[i].split('=', 2);
                                vars[z[0]] = unescape(z[1]);
                            }
                            var lastpage = vars['topage'];
                            var firstpage = vars['frompage'];
                            var beforelast = parseInt(lastpage) - 1;

                            if (vars['page'] != beforelast){
                                hidden = document.getElementsByClassName("hide_beforelast");
                                for (i = 0; i < hidden.length; i++) {
                                    hidden[i].style.visibility = "hidden";
                                }
                            }

                                }
                            }
                            
                            
                        }
